title: The Best KDP Keyword Software I Use to Get Books Ranked on Amazon
description:
➡️ New to KDP - Start HERE : https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL0AJkR-XajxD7MwHVMckjYDsr8nIOQjLK

➡️ How to Do Keyword Research: https://youtu.be/bl7fsrHKaGs

➡️ AMZ Suggestion Expander Pro: https://bit.ly/3zqbHa7
➡️ Publisher Rocket: http://bit.ly/2ThC390
➡️ Helium 10 (20% off and 10% off Deals): https://bit.ly/334S3A3
➡️ Keywords Everywhere: https://keywordseverywhere.com/

When it comes to KDP tools that I use in my self publishing business, one of the most common questions I get asked is what keyword research tools do I use. In this video I give you the top 5 keyword tools that I use on a regular basis, starting from the most simple to the more complex. I compare the tools and give you what I think are the important features to get the maximum benefit out of them.

🛠️  Tools and Resources I use:

➡ Creative Fabrica Special Deal: http://bit.ly/3XLaKoc
➡ Gumroad Shop for KDP Keywords: https://paulmarles.gumroad.com/
➡ Canva: https://bit.ly/paulcanva
➡ Book Bolt (Use paul20 to get 20
